## Load Library

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Reading Datasets

```{r}
data <- list.files("../data", pattern = "zip", full.names = TRUE) %>%
  lapply(read_csv) %>%
  bind_rows
glimpse(data)
```

**Ubah tipe data**

```{r}
data$service <- as.factor(data$service)
data$date <- as.Date(data$date, "%d/%m/%Y")
glimpse(data)
```

View dataset

```{r}
head(data)
```
